<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108309</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206951</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alcatraz Island</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alcatraz Insel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Île d'Alcatraz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Console De Alcatraz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isola Di Alcatraz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νησί Alcatraz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Isla De Alcatraz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Alcatraz is home to one of the world's most infamous prisons. From the 1930s to 1960s, Alcatraz was the premier maximum security prison, housing inmates such as Al Capone and George Machine Gun Kelly. Before the prison was created, the island was home to American Indians. Today, it is one of San Francisco's most prominent tourist attractions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alcatraz ist bis eins der unbeliebtesten 
Gefängnisse der Welt Haupt. Von den dreißiger Jahren zu den 
sechziger Jahren, war Alcatraz das maximale Gefängnis Sicherheit des 
Premiers und brachte Insassen wie Al Capone und George Maschine 
Gewehrkelly unter. Bevor das Gefängnis hergestellt wurde, war 
die Insel zu den Indianern Haupt. Heute ist sie eine von San 
Franciscos vorstehendsten touristischen Anziehungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Alcatraz est à la maison à une des prisons les 
plus infâmes du monde. Des années 30 aux années 60, Alcatraz 
était la prison maximum de sécurité de premier ministre, logeant 
des détenus tels qu'Al Capone et la tige carrée d'entraînement de 
mitrailleuse de George. Avant que la prison ait été 
créée, l'île était à la maison aux Indiens d'Amerique. 
Aujourd'hui, elle est l'une des attractions de touristes les 
plus en avant de San Francisco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alcatraz é home a uma das prisões as mais 
infamous do mundo. Dos 1930s aos 1960s, Alcatraz era a prisão 
máxima da segurança do premier, abrigando inmates tais como o al 
Capone e o kelly do injetor de máquina de George. Antes que a 
prisão estêve criada, o console foi home aos indians americanos. 
Hoje, é uma das atrações tourist as mais proeminentes do San 
Francisco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcatraz è domestico ad una delle prigioni più 
malfamate del mondo. Dai 1930s agli anni 60, Alcatraz era la 
prigione massima di sicurezza di primo ministro, alloggiando gli interni 
quali Al Capone e l'asta quadra di collegamento della pistola di 
macchina di George. Prima che la prigione sia creata, l'isola 
era domestica agli indiani americani. Oggi, è una delle 
attrazioni turistiche più prominenti de San Francisco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Alcatraz είναι κατ' οίκον σε μια από τις 
παγκόσμιες πιό κακόφημες φυλακές. Από τη δεκαετία του '30 
στη δεκαετία του '60, Alcatraz ήταν η αρχαιότερη μέγιστη 
φυλακή ασφάλειας, που στεγάζει τους τρόφιμους όπως το Al 
Capone και kelly πολυβόλων George. Προτού να 
δημιουργηθεί η φυλακή, το νησί ήταν κατ' οίκον σε αμερικανικούς 
Ινδούς. Σήμερα, είναι ένα από τα πιό προεξέχοντα 
τουριστικά αξιοθέατα του Σαν Φρανσίσκο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alcatraz es casero a una de las prisiones más 
infames del mundo. A partir de los años 30 a los años 60, 
Alcatraz era la prisión máxima de la seguridad del primero ministro,
conteniendo a internos tales como al Capone y kelly de la 
ametralladora de George. Antes de que la prisión fuera creada, 
la isla era casera a los indios americanos. Hoy, es una de las 
atracciones turísticas más prominentes de San Francisco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206951</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108309</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/alcatraz-island</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
